```css
// Property: severity
// Description: Indicates the severity of the alert in apps built with Mac Catalyst.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.AlertDialog
'.severity-alert[platform=ios]': { severity: Ti.UI.iOS.ALERT_SEVERITY_DEFAULT }
'.severity-alert-critical[platform=ios]': { severity: Ti.UI.iOS.ALERT_SEVERITY_CRITICAL }
```
